relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucus membranes moist
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation b/l, No W/R/R
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, scaphoid, notable for moderate TTP in the RLQ on light/deep palpation, without guarding. No masses or hernias. Appropriately healed midline laparotomy scar.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused
